channel.title: Ssh on Security Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Ssh on Security Notes

item.title: Port Forward (Tunnelling) Quick Reference Guide
item.description: PORT FORWARDING “port to port”: Metasploit Works on many platforms Forward: Get meterpreter session on one of the dual homed machines portfwd add -l 4445 -p 4443 -r 10.1.1.1 Use -R to make it reverse SSH Works on Linux Cond: “if you already have an SSH session” Remote Port Forwarding -R 8081:192.168.0.5:80 (on my Kali machine listen on 8081, get it from 192.168.0.5:80) <KALI 10.
